title: Huddersfield Town's Jack Payne joins Blackburn Rovers on loan
description: Jack Payne has joined Blackburn Rovers on loan until the end of the season from Huddersfield Town.
content: Huddersfield recalled the attacking midfielder from his loan spell at Oxford United on Monday.Payne made 34 appearances for the League One side since joining them in July last year.The 23-year-old scored seven goals in his time at the Kassam Stadium, including one against their rivals and his new team, Blackburn Rovers.
